biography:
Gina Ryder (born on January 23, 1977 in San Antonio, Texas, USA) is an American porn star of Latin origin. She has D cup fake breasts. Gina also does voiceover work on anime released by video company NuTech.

She has worked for Adam & Eve, Wicked, Vivid, Sin City, Cal Vista/Metro, and Legend amongst others. She also appears on The Erotic Network, Spice, The Playboy Channel, and can sometimes be seen in R-rated films for Showtime and Cinemax. She is married to an industry cameraman. She has starred in 300 adult movies.
name: Gina Ryder
